about.heroSubtitle: Where we bring the sea and adventure to you
about.storyParagraph1: At Coral & Shells Center, our passion for the sea runs deep. We believe in the thrill of adventure and the joy of discovery, and we're dedicated to helping you explore the magical underwater world.
about.storyParagraph2: Whether you're taking your first breath underwater or are a seasoned pro, we have everything you need. Our center offers a wide range of courses designed to take you from a beginner to a certified diver.
about.storyParagraph3: Join us as we dive into the wonders of the marine world and explore its beauty and help protect its treasures for generations to come.
about.promiseDescription: We promise you a world-class experience that goes beyond the ordinary. We are committed to being the leading diving center in Saudi Arabia by providing exceptional training, education, and services. We'll equip you with top-quality gear and empower you with the skills to dive confidently and safely. Our goal is to build a passionate community dedicated to exploring and conserving our incredible marine environment.
about.whyChooseDescription: At Corals and Shells Center, we believe the sea holds a universe of wonders, and we're here to help you explore it.
about.whyChooseClosing: We provide a welcoming and supportive environment where you can learn and grow at your own pace. Our certified instructors and top-quality gear ensure that you receive the best training and a safe experience. Join us, and discover why we are the trusted choice for those ready to explore the sea's treasures.

about.valueGoalDescription: We help you achieve your diving goals, from beginner to professional.
about.valueInnovativeDescription: Modern teaching methods and latest diving techniques and equipment.

faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our programs, courses, and services
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search

general.q1: Is Corals & Shells only a diving center?
general.a1: No. Corals & Shells is a water sports center offering swimming programs, diving courses, and long-term training paths for children, adults, and families, delivered within clear structures and approved safety standards.
general.q2: Are the programs suitable for everyone?
general.a2: Not necessarily. Some programs require specific physical readiness, age criteria, or time commitment. Suitability is determined based on the program and may require prior assessment.
general.q3: What is the difference between courses and paths?
general.a3: Courses are fixed-duration programs with specific outcomes. Paths are structured, long-term programs based on progression, readiness, and consistency, rather than speed or volume.

programs.q1: Where does the training take place?
programs.a1: Training locations depend on the program and may include: swimming pools, open water (sea), or a combination of both. This will be clearly communicated before the program starts.
programs.q2: Do diving courses result in an internationally recognized certification?
programs.a2: Yes. Foundational diving courses conclude with internationally recognized certifications, depending on the course type and applied standards.
programs.q3: What happens if a participant is not ready for a program?
programs.a3: If a participant is not ready, we may: postpone participation, or recommend a more suitable alternative program. Safety and readiness are always the priority.

participants.q1: Do you offer programs for children?
participants.a1: Yes. We offer swimming and diving programs for children, designed according to age groups and delivered with a gradual, safety-focused approach that builds confidence in the water.
participants.q2: Are there programs specifically for women?
participants.a2: Yes. We offer women-only swimming programs, such as the Fear-Breaking Program, in a safe and supportive environment. In addition to our Blue Path Program that ensures safe swimmers. We also offer separate diving classes.
participants.a3: Yes. Family swimming and water activity programs are available and designed to suit different ages and ability levels.

registration.q1: Can I register directly for any program?
registration.a1: Some programs allow direct registration. Others, especially long-term paths, require a prior assessment before acceptance.
registration.q2: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
registration.a2: No. All programs have approved fees, and no informal discounts or exceptions are offered. This ensures fairness, quality, and safety for all participants. Limited offers are subject to center scheduling for families and groups.
registration.a3: Refund and change policies are governed by the Terms & Conditions of each program and will be clearly communicated before registration is confirmed.
registration.q4: How can I contact you or register?
registration.a4: You can contact us through the website or official communication channels. Your request will be reviewed and guided according to the relevant program and procedures.

faq.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is happy to help.
